newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RUGBY UNION-ACT BEAT WELLINGTON 33-20 IN SUPER 12 SEMIFINAL.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-ACT BEAT WELLINGTON 33-20 IN SUPER 12 SEMIFINAL.

text.p: The Australian Capital Territory beat Wellington 33-20 (halftime 13-3) in their Super 12 semifinal rugby union match at Bruce Stadium on Saturday.
ACT - Tries: George Gregan, Joe Roff, James Holbeck (2), Mitch Hardy. Conversion: David Knox. Penalties: Knox (2).
Wellington - Tries: Christian Cullen (2). Conversions: Jon Preston (2). Penalties: Preston (2)
